top.title: US could ask foreign tourists for five-year social media history before entry
top.summary: The plan would affect people from countries, including the UK, who can fill out a form in lieu of a visa.

top.title: Ukraine at critical moment, European leaders say after Trump call
top.summary: "Intensive work" is continuing, the leaders of Britain, France and Germany say after a joint call with Donald Trump.

top.title: Iceland becomes fifth country to boycott Eurovision
top.summary: Iceland joins Spain, Ireland, Slovenia and the Netherlands in saying it will boycott the 2026 contest.

top.title: Porn company starts new age checks after £1m Ofcom fine
top.summary: The media regulator Ofcom said AVS Group Ltd had started age checks on some of its porn websites.

top.title: McDonald's pulls AI Christmas ad after backlash
top.summary: McDonald's said the moment served as "an important learning" as it explored "the effective use of AI".

top.title: People spending even more time online now than during the pandemic
top.summary: The survey found people in the UK spent on average four hours and 30 minutes online every day in 2025
